Class RestAccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elenamedrano.controller.RestAccountController

  • @RestController
public class RestAccountController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController to handle and resolve REST API requests.

    ElenaM

    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        @RequestMapping(value="/account/accountId/{accountId}/balance/{balance}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> createAccount(@PathVariable(value="accountId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String accountId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable(value="balance")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     double balance)
        Requests for new account creation are redirected to this method.
        Parameters:
        accountId - String containing the id for the new account. Must be unique.
        balance - double containing the initial amount for the new account.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity containing the information about the transaction result.

      • transferAmount

        @RequestMapping(value="/transfer/sourceAccountId/{sourceAccountId}/targetAccountId/{targetAccountId}/amount/{amount}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> transferAmount(@PathVariable(value="sourceAccountId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String sourceAccountId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable(value="targetAccountId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String targetAccountId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable(value="amount")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   double amount)
        Requests for amount transfers between accounts are redirected to this method.
        Parameters:
        sourceAccountId - String containing the Source Account Id.
        targetAccountId - String containing the Target Account Id.
        amount - double containing the amount to be transferred from source account to target.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity containing the information about the transaction result.
